summary:
Masters in Conjuration can now bind atronachs permanently using the Atronach Forge.
Atronachs can follow the player or guard some location in the world

Of course, nothing comes for free, mastery requires knowledge. You must constanly search and study daedric items.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]SKSE FREE[/color]
[i]Doesn't change anything in the vanilla game
Doesn't alter the Atronach forge
Doesn't change the vanilla follower system[/i]
[i]Compatible with everything[/i]

Have you ever wanted to have permanent atronach guards in your house? Just like the Winterhold Frost Atronachs near the Chill ?
Or maybe you wanted to use them as followers?

[youtube]IzU1I8zNfQc[/youtube]

Masters in Conjuration can now bind atronachs permanently using the Atronach Forge. 
Atronachs can follow the player or guard some location in the world

[b][u]How to gain the Atronach points?[/u][/b]
[i](strongly recommended to watch the video)
[/i]
If you have Conjuration > 90 you can study daedric items to learn the nature of the daedra. Every item can be examined only once.

1) Hide your weapons
2) Drop the item from your inventory
3) Look at the item for several seconds
4) Every time you study the object, you will recieve the atronach points (atronachs to summon at the forge)
Draw your weapon the stop the animation.

5) You will also see the message describing the object properties, try to remember them. There is a short-term memory mini-game. If you correctly remember the property after several minutes, you will recieve additional atronachs to summon.

[b][u]How to bind Atronachs at the Forge?[/u][/b]
Just place the ingredients in the offering box as usual.
There are no limits of how many atronachs you can bind, but you must constantly search and study more daedric items to recieve more points.

[b][color=yellow]Fire Atronach:[/color][/b]
Common Soulgem with a common soul (usually the one you can find in the world, not the one you create)
Fire Salts

[b][color=yellow]Frost Atronach:[/color][/b]
Greater Soulgem with a greater soul
Frost Salts

[b][color=yellow]Storm Atronach:[/color][/b]
Grand Soulgem with a grand soul
Void Salts

Binding requires blood, so you will take 40 points of health damage

[b][u]How to command Atronachs?[/u][/b]
Press the "Use" key on the atronach

Follow - will follow the player
Guard this location - will wait
Dissolve - will disaapear for several seconds allowing the player to walk through
Point - use the vanilla follower command system ("Favors")


[u]The original idea belongs to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1994759-darkgenius/]DarkGenius
[/url][/u]
Quote from the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedra]lore[/url]:
[i]Worshipers may bind daedric servants to this plane through rituals and pacts. Such arrangements result in the Daedric servant remaining on this plane indefinitely - or at least until their bodily manifestations on this plane are destroyed, precipitating their supernatural essences back to Oblivion.[/i]
